synopsis.text: Now enter the world of Yukinari, a diminutive high school student who has spent his life tormented by girls, resulting in an unusual phobia: breaking out in hives at their mere touch. His life takes a dramatic turn when he is mysteriously transported to Seiren, a hidden realm populated predominantly by women and orbiting Earth. In this new world, Yukinari encounters Miharu, a captivating young woman whose touch, surprisingly, does not trigger his phobia. This unexpected friendship sparks a transformation in Yukinari's perspective on women, offering a glimmer of hope for a brighter future.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
